content:

alexcrichton commented on issue #4874:

Indeed, yeah, the 1.0 branch was created over the weekend as the 0.41.0 branch which I've since updated to be a release-1.0.0 branch and its version bump is at https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/4873

In general the version in main is one-ahead of whatever the latest release is, or what's about to become the latest release.

fitzgen commented on issue #4874:

Ah I see, I was off by one :-p
